Class PropertySystem

java.lang.Object
System.PropertySystem
public class PropertySystem extends Object
The PropertySystem class stores all properties and their reservations. It handles the core business logic but does not interact with the user.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PropertySystem()
    Constructs a PropertySystem and loads sample properties.

  • Constructor Details

    • PropertySystem

      public PropertySystem()
      Constructs a PropertySystem and loads sample properties.

  • Method Details

    • getPropertyCount

      public int getPropertyCount()
      Returns the number of properties stored.
      Returns:
      the number of properties

    • getProperty

      public Property getProperty(int index)
      Retrieves the Property at a specific index. If the index is invalid, null is returned.
      Parameters:
      index - the property index
      Returns:
      the Property, or null if index is invalid

    • propertyNameExists

      public boolean propertyNameExists(String name)
      Checks if a property name already exists.
      Parameters:
      name - the name to check
      Returns:
      true if a property with this name exists; false otherwise

    • createProperty

      public int createProperty(String name, PropertyType type, int[] days)
      Creates a new property with a given name, type, and listed days. Only valid days (1–30) are added. Duplicate days are ignored. If creation succeeds, the index of the new property is returned. If creation fails (for example, no valid days), -1 is returned.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the property
      type - the type of the property
      days - an array of day numbers to list (1–30)
      Returns:
      the index of the new property; -1 if creation fails

    • changePropertyName

      public boolean changePropertyName(int index, String newName)
      Changes the name of a property if the new name is not a duplicate.
      Parameters:
      index - the property index
      newName - the new name to set
      Returns:
      true if the name is changed; false otherwise

    • hasReservations

      public boolean hasReservations(int index)
      Returns true if this property has at least one reservation.
      Parameters:
      index - the property index
      Returns:
      true if there are reservations; false otherwise

    • updateBasePrice

      public boolean updateBasePrice(int index, double newBase)
      Updates the base price of all dates of a property. This method does not check for reservations; this should be done by the caller before calling this method.
      Parameters:
      index - the property index
      newBase - the new base price
      Returns:
      true if the property exists and the price was updated; false otherwise

    • changePropertyType

      public boolean changePropertyType(int index, PropertyType newType)
      Changes the type of a property.
      Parameters:
      index - the property index
      newType - the new property type
      Returns:
      true if updated; false otherwise

    • removeProperty

      public boolean removeProperty(int index)
      Removes a property and its reservations if it has no reservations.
      Parameters:
      index - the property index
      Returns:
      true if removed; false otherwise

    • getReservationsForProperty

      public ArrayList<Reservation> getReservationsForProperty(int index)
      Returns the list of reservations for a specific property. If the index is invalid, an empty list is returned.
      Parameters:
      index - the property index
      Returns:
      the list of reservations (may be empty)

    • removeReservation

      public boolean removeReservation(int propertyIndex, int reservationIndex)
      Removes a reservation by its position in the list of a property.
      Parameters:
      propertyIndex - the property index
      reservationIndex - the index of the reservation to remove
      Returns:
      true if removed successfully; false otherwise

    • areDatesAvailable

      public boolean areDatesAvailable(int propertyIndex, int checkIn, int checkOut)
      Checks if all dates in a given range are listed and available.
      Parameters:
      propertyIndex - the property to check
      checkIn - the check-in day
      checkOut - the check-out day
      Returns:
      true if all dates are available; false otherwise

    • addReservation

      public Reservation addReservation(int propertyIndex, String guest, int checkIn, int checkOut)
      Adds a reservation for a property if possible. The reservation is added to both the Property and the internal list. If adding fails, null is returned.
      Parameters:
      propertyIndex - the property index
      guest - the guest name
      checkIn - the check-in day
      checkOut - the check-out day
      Returns:
      the Reservation object if added; null otherwise

    • setEnvironmentalRateForDate

      public boolean setEnvironmentalRateForDate(int propertyIndex, int day, double rate)
      Sets the environmental rate for a specific date of a property.
      Parameters:
      propertyIndex - the property index
      day - the day number (1–30)
      rate - the environmental rate (0.80–1.20)
      Returns:
      true if updated; false otherwise

    • setEnvironmentalRateForAllDates

      public boolean setEnvironmentalRateForAllDates(int propertyIndex, double rate)
      Sets the same environmental rate for all listed dates of a property.
      Parameters:
      propertyIndex - the property index
      rate - the environmental rate (0.80–1.20)
      Returns:
      true if the property exists; false otherwise

    • randomizeEnvironmentalRates

      public void randomizeEnvironmentalRates(int propertyIndex)
      Randomizes the environmental rate for all listed dates of a property. Rates are between 0.80 and 1.20, rounded to 2 decimal places.
      Parameters:
      propertyIndex - the property index

    • setEnvironmentalRateForRange

      public boolean setEnvironmentalRateForRange(int index, int start, int end, double rate)
      Sets the environmental rate for a range of days.
      Parameters:
      index - the property index
      start - the starting day (1–30)
      end - the ending day (1–30)
      rate - the environmental rate (0.80–1.20)
      Returns:
      true if all days were updated
